src:
Entah Harus Bangga atau Sedih, Ini Bukti AC Milan dan MU Musim Ini Kompak
05 Nov 2019, 14:39 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Awal buruk dicatat dua tim besar Eropa. Manchester United dan AC Milan memiliki awal musim yang sama sekali tak bisa dibanggakan. Kedua klub saat ini sama-sama terpuruk di liga domestik.
Pada laga terakhir, kedua klub tersebut sama-sama meraih hasil minor. Manchester United tumbang dengan skor 0-1 dari tuan rumah Bournemouth, Sabtu (2/11/2019), di Vitality Stadium.
Sementara itu, AC Milan kalah dari tuan tamunya Lazio dengan skor 1-2, Senin (4/11/2019), di San Siro. Hasil tersebut tentunya sangat memalukan bagi Rossoneri karena disaksikan di depan pendukungnya sendiri.
Padahal pada bursa transfer musim panas 2019, kedua klub tersebut banyak mendatangkan pemain berkualitas. Setan Merah memboyong Harry Maguire dengan banderol 85 juta pounds (Rp1,53 triliun).
Klub yang bermarkas di Old Trafford itu juga mendatangkan pemain muda potensial seperti Aaron Wan-Bissaka dan Daniel James.
Sedangkan AC Milan sukses memboyong Theo Hernandes dari Real Madrid dan pemain terbaik Piala Afrika 2019, Ismael Bennacer. Meskipun sudah mendatangkan pemain-pemain terbaik, Manchester United dan AC Milan tetap mendapatkan hasil yang kurang memuaskan.
Selain hal-hal tersebut masih banyak hal lain yang menunjukkan kesamaan antara kedua klub tersebut. Melansir dari Bola.com berikut bukti kekompakan Manchester United dan AC Milan sejauh perjalanan musim ini.
text:
Either Must Be Proud or Sad, This Is Evidence AC Milan and MU This Season Is Compact
05 Nov 2019, 14:39 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bad start recorded by two big European teams. Manchester United and AC Milan had the start of a season that they could not be proud of at all. Both clubs are currently equally slumped in the domestic league.
In the last match, the two clubs both won minor results. Manchester United fell with a score of 0-1 from Bournemouth host on Saturday (11/02/2019), at the Vitality Stadium.
Meanwhile, AC Milan lost to their host Lazio by a score of 1-2 on Monday (11/04/2019), at the San Siro. The result is certainly very embarrassing for the Rossoneri because it was witnessed in front of his own supporters.
Whereas in the summer transfer market in 2019, the two clubs brought in a lot of quality players. Red Devils brought Harry Maguire with the official tag of 85 million pounds (Rp1.53 trillion).
The club, based at Old Trafford, also brought in potential young players such as Aaron Wan-Bissaka and Daniel James.
While AC Milan successfully brought Theo Hernandes from Real Madrid and the 2019 Africa Cup of Nations best player, Ismael Bennacer. Despite having brought the best players, Manchester United and AC Milan still get unsatisfactory results.
Besides these things there are still many other things that show the similarity between the two clubs. Launching from Bola.com follows evidence of the cohesiveness of Manchester United and AC Milan so far this season's travels.
